"Deactivate the Time Bombs": "Deactivate all the time bombs!"
"Deactivate all the time bombs!"

"We've identified several time bombs put in place by Darkers! You'll need to deal with them before they explode."
"Time bombs pack a punch, but if you can figure out how they're put together, it's possible to deactivate them. You'll need to inspect them."

"All time bombs have been deactivated.

"It seems there was a mistake in your input, but you won't be able to try again right away."
"There's only 30 seconds left before they blow! Deal with them as fast as you can."
"We're currently at work dealing with some Darker time bombs. Please assist!"
"Blast... looks like we've got some Darker time bombs on our hands. Hurry, we'll need to take these things out before they blow."
"These things are a nasty bunch and pack a lot of power, but they can be deactivated. You'll have to do it before time runs out."
"Excellent! All time bombs have been deactivated. Well done."

"The heat readings are off the charts!
Were you unable to stop them?!"
"Excellent, you've deactivated half of them. Keep it up!"
"Only one time bomb left. Don't let your guard down until they've all been deactivated."
"The reading for this bomb has weakened... Looks like you've deactivated it."
"Blast, something went wrong... Looks like you'll have to wait a bit before you can try the deactivation code again."
"Hurry! There's only 30 more seconds until the bombs go off."
"Ah, you've arrived at the perfect time.We're currently dealing with some Darker time bombs. Think you can lend a hand?"
